DOC.brief_summary: Mounting evidence indicates intranasal administration neuropeptide oxytocin prosocial effect . However , neural substrate effect still unclear . The investigator hypothesize single dose administration oxytocin increase empathogenic affiliative response effect mediate increased insula activity .
DOC.brief_title: Neural Correlates Empathogenic Affiliative Actions Oxytocin
DOC.criteria: Healthy male volunteer In heterosexual relationship Current past psychiatric disease Current past physical illness Psychoactive medication Tobacco smoker
